name: Poppy Seed Chicken
ingredients: 1 whole chicken, cooked, deboned 1 6 oz pkg Ritz crackers
1 can cream of chicken soup 2 Tbsp poppyseed
1 1/2 cup sour cream 3/4 cube of margarine, melted
steps: Cut up chicken into bite-­‐sized pieces and place in the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan. Mix soup and sour cream
together and pour over chicken. Crush crackers and mix with poppyseed and margarine. Bake at 350
